languages.text: "Даже на забытой всеми планете человек продолжает искать свободу и по-своему чествовать Императора…" {n}Вздохнув, Джай поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Людям надо во что-то верить, чтобы жить. А лучшая судьба — кто из нас когда-нибудь не мечтал о ней?"

"Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"
languages.original_text: "Даже на забытой всеми планете человек продолжает искать свободу и по-своему чествовать Императора…" {n}Вздохнув, Джай поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Людям надо во что-то верить, чтобы жить. А лучшая судьба — кто из нас когда-нибудь не мечтал о ней?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae narrows her eyes tensely.{/n} "It's not often one hears such declamations from the lips of those who claim to be loyal to the Exalted One's will. The Ecclesiarchy teaches us to accept our destiny with humility. The Imperial Cult has no need for freethinkers."
{n}Jae averts her eyes.{/n} "Never have I heard such a bold pronouncement before, shereen... The Ecclesiarchy teaches resignation to one's fate. The Imperial Cult has no need of libertines."

"Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamed of that?"

{n}Jae narrows her eyes tensely.{/n} "It's not often one hears such declamations from the lips of those who claim to be loyal to the Exalted One's will. The Ecclesiarchy teaches us to accept our destiny with humility. The Imperial Cult has no need for freethinkers."

"Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

{n}Jae narrows her eyes tensely.{/n} "It's not often one hears such declamations from the lips of those who claim to be loyal to the Exalted One's will. The Ecclesiarchy teaches us to accept our destiny with humility. The Imperial Cult has no need for freethinkers."

"Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

"Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamed of that?"

languages.text: “哪怕是在这颗被所有人遗忘的行星上，人类依然在寻求自由，以他们自己的方式崇拜帝皇……”{n}婕伊叹了口气，转向你。{/n}“为了存活下来，人类必须相信某些东西。至于‘更好的命运’之类的说法，我们有谁没幻想过这些呢？”
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

traits.locale_text: “哪怕是在这颗被所有人遗忘的行星上，人类依然在寻求自由，以他们自己的方式崇拜帝皇……”{n}婕伊叹了口气，转向你。{/n}“为了存活下来，人类必须相信某些东西。至于‘更好的命运’之类的说法，我们有谁没幻想过这些呢？”
{n}婕伊狐疑地眯起了眼睛。{/n}“忠于至高无上的神皇的人，很少有人会说出这样的话。国教教会教导我们要心怀谦卑，遵从命运的安排，不需要自由思想。”

languages.text: «Incluso en un planeta olvidado por todos, la Humanidad sigue buscando la libertad y honrar al Emperador a su manera...». {n}Jae suspira y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Los humanos necesitamos creer en algo para vivir. Y un destino mejor... ¿quién no ha soñado alguna vez con esto?».
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

traits.locale_text: «Incluso en un planeta olvidado por todos, la Humanidad sigue buscando la libertad y honrar al Emperador a su manera...». {n}Jae suspira y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Los humanos necesitamos creer en algo para vivir. Y un destino mejor... ¿quién no ha soñado alguna vez con esto?».

languages.text: "İnsanlık, unutulmuş bir gezegende bile hâlâ özgürlüğün ve kendince İmparator'u onurlandırmanın peşinde." {n}İç çeken Jae, sana doğru dönüyor.{/n} "İnsanların yaşayabilmek için bir şeylere inanmaya ihtiyacı var. Daha iyi bir kadere de... Sonuçta hangimiz bunun hayalini kurmuyoruz ki?"
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlık, unutulmuş bir gezegende bile hâlâ özgürlüğün ve kendince İmparator'u onurlandırmanın peşinde." {n}İç çeken Jae, sana doğru dönüyor.{/n} "İnsanların yaşayabilmek için bir şeylere inanmaya ihtiyacı var. Daha iyi bir kadere de... Sonuçta hangimiz bunun hayalini kurmuyoruz ki?"

{n}Jae gergin bir şekilde gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Görkemli'nin iradesine sadık olduğunu iddia edenlerin dudaklarından bu tür beyanları duymak sık rastlanan bir durum değil. Ekleşiarşi bize kaderimizi tevazuyla kabul etmeyi öğretir. İmparatorluk Tarikatı'nın özgür düşünenlere ihtiyacı yok."

languages.text: 「たとえすべてに見捨てられた惑星にいても、人類は自由を求め、自分たちなりに皇帝陛下に敬意を表し続けているのよ…」{n}ジェイは溜息をつきながら、あなたの方へ振り向いた。{/n}「人間は何かを信じてこそ生きていけるものよ。よりよい運命を夢見たことがない者なんて、果たしているのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

traits.locale_text: 「たとえすべてに見捨てられた惑星にいても、人類は自由を求め、自分たちなりに皇帝陛下に敬意を表し続けているのよ…」{n}ジェイは溜息をつきながら、あなたの方へ振り向いた。{/n}「人間は何かを信じてこそ生きていけるものよ。よりよい運命を夢見たことがない者なんて、果たしているのかしら？」
{n}ジェイは緊張して目を細める。{/n}「これほどの熱弁を、エグザルテッド・ワンのご意思に忠誠を誓う者たちの口から聞くことはそう多くないわ。教会はアタシたちに運命を謙虚に受け入れるよう教えてる。帝国聖教会に自由思想家の居場所はないのよ」

languages.text: « Même sur une planète oubliée de tous, l'humanité honore encore l'Empereur à sa façon et continue d'aspirer à la liberté... {n}Jae soupire et se tourne vers vous.{/n} Les humains ont besoin de croire en quelque chose pour vivre... et d'un meilleur avenir. Qui parmi nous n'en a jamais rêvé ? »
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

traits.locale_text: « Même sur une planète oubliée de tous, l'humanité honore encore l'Empereur à sa façon et continue d'aspirer à la liberté... {n}Jae soupire et se tourne vers vous.{/n} Les humains ont besoin de croire en quelque chose pour vivre... et d'un meilleur avenir. Qui parmi nous n'en a jamais rêvé ? »

languages.text: "Selbst auf einem von allen vergessenen Planeten sucht die Menschheit weiterhin nach Freiheit und will den Imperator auf alle erdenkliche Art ehren ..." {n}Seufzend wendet Jae sich dir zu.{/n} "Menschen müssen an etwas glauben, um leben zu können. Und ein besseres Schicksal – wer von uns hätte davon noch nie geträumt?"
languages.original_text: "Even on a planet forgotten by all, Humanity continues to seek freedom and to honour the Emperor in their own way..." {n}Sighing, Jae turns to you.{/n} "Humans need to believe in something in order to live. And a better destiny — who among us has never dreamt of that?"

Und ein besseres Schicksal – wer von uns hätte davon noch nie geträumt?"
